titleStmt.title: Appendix to Mr. Charles Mearne's catalogue of English books, chiefly of history, miscellany, and law, to be sold by auction at Richard's Coffee-House near the Middle-Temple-Gate, on Tuesday February 22d. 1686/7
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: See Wing (2nd ed.) M1581; Mearne was dead by 26 January 1687.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
By Edward Millington? Millington published a catalog of Mearne's books a few days earlier (Wing (2nd ed.) M1580).
